description:
Man am I excited about this one!

So over dinner he started asking questions.
What would he have to do? What would it would be like? And so forth...

Of course, the first guy who came to mind was Tobey. He doesn't have the charisma of Harley, for example, but stick a nice big dick in him and he's in heaven!
I think Matt really enjoyed fucking Tobey. I think that the only thing he didn't like was the condom. After all, he's used to raw butt sex with his girlfriend(s)!
title: Matt & Tobey
